code: import{useState}from"react";import{db,auth}from"../firebase";import{collection,addDoc}from"firebase/firestore";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CreateUnit=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState("");const[location,setLocation]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleCreateUnit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!name||!location)return alert("Please fill in all fields");try{const docRef=await addDoc(collection(db,"swappy_units"),{name,location,createdBy:auth.currentUser.uid});alert("Swappy Unit Created!");navigate("/dashboard");}catch(error){console.error("Error adding Swappy-Unit:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleCreateUnit,className:"bg-white p-6 rounded shadow-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold",children:"Create Swappy Unit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Unit Name",className:"border p-2 my-2 w-full",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Location",className:"border p-2 my-2 w-full",value:location,onChange:e=>setLocation(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"Create Unit"})]})});};export default CreateUnit;
